text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributing to humanHippocampus2024
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("christinehou11/humanHippocampus2024", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e. just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to humanHippocampus2024
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: humanHippocampus2024 Tutorial
text: Welcome humanHippocampus2024 package! vignettes, going show access spatially-resolved transcriptomics (SRT) single-nucleus RNA-sequencing (snRNA-seq) data adjacent tissue sections anterior human hippocampus across ten adult neurotypical donors generated Lieber Institute Brain Development (LIBD).

title: humanHippocampus2024 Tutorial
text: main purpose create R/Bioconductor package access SRT snRNA-seq data spatial_HPC project via open-source public interface data can referenced analyzed projects conveniently.

title: humanHippocampus2024 Tutorial
text: Experimental design generate paired single-nucleus RNA-sequencing (snRNA-seq) spatially-resolved transcriptomics (SRT) data human hippocampus. () Postmortem human tissue blocks anterior hippocampus dissected 10 adult neurotypical brain donors. Tissue blocks scored cryosectioned snRNA-seq assays (red), placement Visium slides (Visium H&E, black; Visium Spatial Proteogenomics (SPG), yellow). (B) 10μm tissue sections ten donors placed onto 2-5 capture areas include extent HPC(n=36 total capture areas), measurement 10x Genomics Visium H&E platform. (C) 10μm tissue sections two donors placed onto 4 capture areas (n=8 total capture areas) measurement 10x Genomics Visium-SPG platform. (D) Tissue sections (2-4 100μm cryosections per assay) ten donors collected tissue blocks measurement 10x Genomics 3’ gene expression platform. donor, sorted PI+NeuN+ (n=26 total snRNA-seq libraries). (figure created Biorender)

title: humanHippocampus2024 Tutorial
text: data, including raw FASTQ files SpaceRanger/CellRanger processed data outputs, can accessed via Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) accessions GSE264692 (SRT) GSE264624 (snRNA-seq). R scripts created perform analyses can found .

title: humanHippocampus2024 Tutorial
text: humanHippocampus2024 R package available via Bioconductor repository packages. GitHub repository can found . development version can installed GitHub:
code: if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) {     install.packages("BiocManager") }  BiocManager::install("humanHippocampus2024")  ## Check that you have a valid Bioconductor installation BiocManager::valid() install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("christinehou11/humanHippocampus2024")

title: humanHippocampus2024 Tutorial
text: SRT data generated using 10x Genomics Visium (n=36 capture areas) 10x Genomics Visium Spatial Proteogenomics (SPG) (n=8 capture areas). snRNA-seq data generated using 10x Genomics Chromium (n=26 total snRNA-seq libraries).
